test_cases.objective: Verify that custom calculations execute within the specified 60-second timeframe for complex impurity calculations.
prerequisites: Test method with custom calculations loaded

test_steps.action: Load a chromatographic data file containing complex impurity peaks
test_steps.expected_result: Data file loads successfully with all peaks visible

test_steps.action: Apply custom impurity calculation formula to the data set
test_steps.expected_result: Calculation initiates immediately upon command

test_steps.action: Monitor calculation progress until completion
test_steps.expected_result: Calculation completes with correct results

acceptance_criteria: All custom calculations complete within 60 seconds
Calculation results match manually verified values
data_integrity_requirements: Calculation inputs and outputs must be captured in audit trail
No manual intervention allowed during calculation

test_cases.objective: Verify the system can simultaneously acquire data from 8 instruments without performance degradation.
prerequisites: Acquisition methods configured for each instrument

test_steps.action: Initiate acquisition sequences on all 8 instruments simultaneously
test_steps.expected_result: All instruments show 'Run in Progress' status

test_steps.action: Monitor system performance during acquisition
test_steps.expected_result: No error messages or system warnings appear

test_steps.action: Verify data collection for all runs
test_steps.expected_result: Complete chromatographic data captured for all instruments

acceptance_criteria: All 8 instruments acquire data simultaneously without failure
System resources remain within operational limits
No data loss or corruption occurs
regulatory_basis: 21 CFR Part 211 - Current Good Manufacturing Practice
data_integrity_requirements: All acquisition events must be time-stamped in audit trail
Run sequence must be verifiable for each instrument

test_cases.test_name: Custom Calculation Verification for Non-Standard Impurities
test_cases.objective: Verify that the CDS correctly executes custom calculations for non-standard impurity determinations as configured in the vendor's formula editor.
prerequisites: Test method with custom impurity calculations loaded
Sample data set with known impurity values

test_steps.action: Load the test method containing custom impurity calculations into the CDS.
test_steps.expected_result: Method loads successfully with all custom calculations visible in the formula editor.

test_steps.action: Process the sample data set through the method.
test_steps.expected_result: Sample data processes without errors and generates impurity results.

test_steps.action: Compare calculated impurity values against known values.
test_steps.expected_result: Calculated values match expected values within acceptable tolerance.

acceptance_criteria: All custom calculations execute correctly
Results match expected values within ±5%
Processing completes within 60 seconds
data_integrity_requirements: Calculation formulas cannot be modified without audit trail
Results cannot be overwritten

test_cases.objective: Verify that custom export routines correctly transfer analytical data to LIMS in the specified XML format.

test_steps.action: Process the sample data set through the CDS to generate results.
test_steps.expected_result: Data processes successfully and results are available for export.

test_steps.action: Execute the custom export routine to transfer data to LIMS.
test_steps.expected_result: Export completes without errors and confirmation message appears.

test_steps.action: Verify data in LIMS matches CDS results.
test_steps.expected_result: All data fields transferred correctly with no data corruption.

test_steps.action: Inspect XML file structure and content.
test_steps.expected_result: XML file conforms to specified schema and contains all required data elements.

acceptance_criteria: Data transfer completes successfully
All data fields transfer accurately
XML structure validates against schema
Transfer completes within system performance requirements
data_integrity_requirements: Audit trail records export event
Data cannot be modified during transfer
Transfer verification mechanism exists

test_cases.objective: Verify that custom calculation routines execute within the specified time frame of 60 seconds as per URS-CDS-014.
prerequisites: Custom calculation routines developed and loaded

test_steps.action: Load sample chromatographic data into the CDS.
test_steps.expected_result: Data is successfully loaded and ready for processing.

test_steps.action: Execute the custom calculation routine.
test_steps.expected_result: Calculation completes within 60 seconds.

acceptance_criteria: Custom calculation routines must complete within 60 seconds.
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure data integrity during calculation execution.

test_cases.objective: Verify that custom reports can be generated using the vendor's report designer as per URS-CDS-005.

test_steps.action: Load sample chromatographic data into the CDS.
test_steps.expected_result: Data is successfully loaded and ready for processing.

test_steps.action: Generate a custom report using the vendor's report designer.
test_steps.expected_result: Report is generated successfully and matches the predefined template.

acceptance_criteria: Custom reports must be generated accurately and match the predefined templates.
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure data integrity during report generation.

test_cases.objective: Verify that custom calculation routines execute within the specified time frame of 60 seconds as per URS-CDS-014.

test_steps.action: Load sample chromatographic data into the CDS software.
test_steps.expected_result: Data is successfully loaded and ready for processing.

test_steps.action: Execute custom calculation routine on the loaded data.
test_steps.expected_result: Custom calculation routine completes execution within 60 seconds.

acceptance_criteria: Custom calculation routine executes within 60 seconds
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure data integrity during calculation execution

test_cases.objective: Validate the generation of custom reports using the vendor's report designer as per URS-CDS-005.

test_steps.action: Load sample chromatographic data into the CDS software.
test_steps.expected_result: Data is successfully loaded and ready for processing.

test_steps.action: Generate a custom report using the configured template.
test_steps.expected_result: Custom report is generated accurately and includes all required data fields.

acceptance_criteria: Custom report is generated accurately and includes all required data fields
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure data integrity during report generation

test_cases.test_name: Custom Report Generation and Export Verification
test_cases.objective: Verify the system's ability to generate custom reports using the vendor's report designer and export them in the required format for LIMS interface.

test_steps.action: Create a custom report template using the vendor's report designer with non-standard impurity calculations.
test_steps.expected_result: Report template is successfully created and saved.

test_steps.action: Generate a report using the custom template with test chromatographic data.
test_steps.expected_result: Report is generated without errors and contains correct data.

test_steps.action: Export the generated report to the LIMS using the standard XML format.
test_steps.expected_result: Report is successfully exported and received by LIMS.

acceptance_criteria: Custom report template is created and saved successfully.
Report generation completes within 60 seconds.
Exported report is accurately received by LIMS.
data_integrity_requirements: Audit trail must record all report generation and export activities.
Data must not be altered during export.

test_cases.test_name: System Suitability and Advanced Trending Verification
test_cases.objective: Verify the system's ability to perform enhanced system suitability calculations and advanced trending for method performance.
prerequisites: Test method with system suitability criteria available

test_steps.action: Execute a test run with system suitability criteria and verify the calculations.
test_steps.expected_result: System suitability calculations are performed correctly and match expected results.

test_steps.action: Generate a trending report for method performance using historical data.
test_steps.expected_result: Trending report is generated and displays correct performance metrics.

test_steps.action: Verify the audit trail records all system suitability and trending activities.
test_steps.expected_result: Audit trail contains complete records of all activities.

acceptance_criteria: System suitability calculations complete within 30 seconds.
Trending report generation completes within 60 seconds.
Audit trail is complete and accurate.
data_integrity_requirements: Audit trail must record all system suitability and trending activities.
Data must not be altered during calculations.

test_cases.objective: Verify that custom calculation routines execute within the specified time frame of 60 seconds as per URS-CDS-014.

test_steps.action: Load a chromatographic data set with custom calculations configured.
test_steps.expected_result: Data set loads successfully without errors.

test_steps.action: Execute the custom calculation routine.
test_steps.expected_result: Calculation completes within 60 seconds.

acceptance_criteria: Custom calculation routines execute within 60 seconds.
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure data integrity during calculation execution.

test_cases.objective: Verify that custom reports can be generated using the vendor's report designer as per URS-CDS-005.

test_steps.action: Select a chromatographic data set for report generation.
test_steps.expected_result: Data set is selected successfully.

test_steps.action: Generate a custom report using the configured template.
test_steps.expected_result: Report is generated without errors and contains all required data.

acceptance_criteria: Custom reports are generated correctly and contain all specified data.

test_cases.objective: Verify that custom calculation routines execute within the specified 60-second timeframe.

test_steps.action: Initiate custom calculation routine on test data set.
test_steps.expected_result: Calculation completes within 60 seconds.

acceptance_criteria: Custom calculation routine completes within 60 seconds.

test_cases.test_name: Custom Export Routine to LIMS Verification
test_cases.objective: Verify that custom export routines correctly transfer data to LIMS in the specified XML format.

test_steps.expected_result: Data is correctly transferred in XML format.

acceptance_criteria: Data is correctly transferred to LIMS in XML format.

test_cases.test_name: Custom Export Routines for LIMS Interface Verification
test_cases.objective: Verify that the CDS can generate and export data to LIMS using the standard XML format as specified in URS-CDS-019.

test_steps.action: Configure the CDS to export data to LIMS using the XML format.
test_steps.expected_result: CDS configuration for XML export is successfully completed.

test_steps.action: Execute the export routine from the CDS to LIMS.
test_steps.expected_result: Data is successfully exported to LIMS in the correct XML format.

acceptance_criteria: Data exported matches the expected format and content
LIMS successfully imports the data
data_integrity_requirements: Data integrity must be maintained during export

test_cases.objective: Verify that custom calculations using the vendor's formula editor execute within the specified 60-second timeframe as per URS-CDS-014.

test_steps.expected_result: Dataset is successfully loaded and ready for processing.

test_steps.action: Execute the custom calculation routine.
test_steps.expected_result: Calculations complete within 60 seconds.

Results are accurate and match expected values

test_cases.test_name: Custom Formula Editor Verification for Non-Standard Impurity Calculations
test_cases.objective: Verify the CDS correctly executes custom impurity calculations using the vendor's formula editor as specified in URS-CDS-004.
prerequisites: Test method with custom impurity calculations loaded
Sample data set with known impurity values

test_steps.action: Load the test method containing custom impurity calculations into the CDS.
test_steps.expected_result: Method loads successfully with all custom formulas intact.

test_steps.action: Process the sample data set through the method.
test_steps.expected_result: System processes data without errors and applies custom calculations.

test_steps.action: Compare calculated impurity values against manually verified results.
test_steps.expected_result: Calculated values match manual calculations within acceptable tolerance.

acceptance_criteria: All custom formulas execute without errors
Calculated impurity values are within ±5% of expected values
Processing completes within 60 seconds per URS-CDS-014
regulatory_basis: ICH Q2(R1) validation of analytical procedures
data_integrity_requirements: Audit trail records all calculation steps
Original data remains unaltered

test_cases.objective: Validate the system can simultaneously acquire data from 8 instruments as required by URS-CDS-012.
prerequisites: Identical test methods loaded on all instruments

test_steps.action: Initiate simultaneous runs on all 8 instruments using identical methods.
test_steps.expected_result: System accepts and initiates all runs without errors.

test_steps.action: Monitor system performance during acquisition.
test_steps.expected_result: All instruments remain connected and transmit data continuously.

test_steps.action: Verify all acquired data files are complete and uncorrupted.
test_steps.expected_result: 8 complete data sets are stored with proper audit trail entries.

acceptance_criteria: System maintains stable connections to all 8 instruments
No data loss or corruption occurs during acquisition
CPU utilization remains below 80% throughout test
regulatory_basis: 21 CFR Part 11 for continuous data acquisition
data_integrity_requirements: Complete chain of custody for all data streams
Synchronized timestamps across instruments

test_cases.test_name: Custom Export Routines for LIMS Interface Verification
test_cases.objective: Verify that custom export routines for LIMS interface function correctly and export data in the required XML format.

test_steps.action: Initiate export of sample data from CDS to LIMS.
test_steps.expected_result: Data is exported successfully without errors.

test_steps.action: Validate the exported XML file against the LIMS schema.
test_steps.expected_result: XML file conforms to the LIMS schema requirements.

acceptance_criteria: Data export completes successfully
Exported XML file is valid
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure data integrity during export
